summary: Iteration 9 - New Features Testing: Chat System, Drive System, Bulk Import, E-Invoice & E-Way Bill. All 4 new features working correctly with 21/21 backend tests passed and all UI components verified.
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_Folder_Iter9 folder in Drive, TEST_Task from iteration 9 task in Chat
context_for_next_testing_agent: 4 new major features fully tested and working: Chat (WhatsApp-style messaging with conversations, tasks), Drive (Google Drive-style file storage with folders, file types, storage indicator), Bulk Import (Excel upload for customers, items, opening balance, opening stock with template downloads), E-Invoice (GST IRN generation and E-Way Bill with MOCKED NIC API integration).

login.details: Login with admin@instabiz.com / adminpassword works correctly

chat_page.details: Chat page loads with Messages header, Chats/Tasks tabs, search functionality, conversation list, and message area. Backend APIs: GET /api/chat/conversations, GET /api/chat/users, GET /api/chat/tasks, POST /api/chat/tasks all working.

drive_page.details: Drive page loads with My Drive, Recent, Favorites, Shared with me navigation. File Types filters (Images, Documents, Spreadsheets, PDFs, Videos). Storage indicator showing '0 B of 5 GB used'. Upload, New Folder, Grid/List view toggle, Search all present. Backend APIs: GET /api/drive/storage, GET /api/drive/folders, GET /api/drive/files, POST /api/drive/folders all working.

bulk_import_page.details: Bulk Import page loads with 4 tabs: Customers, Items, Opening Balance, Opening Stock. Each tab has Download Template and Upload & Import buttons. Import Guidelines and Quick Tips sections present. Backend APIs: GET /api/bulk-import/templates/{type} for all 4 types returns Excel files correctly.

einvoice_page.details: E-Invoice page loads with summary cards (Total Invoices, IRN Generated, IRN Pending, E-Way Bills). 3 tabs: E-Invoice, E-Way Bill, Activity Logs. Refresh and API Settings buttons present. Backend APIs: GET /api/einvoice/summary, GET /api/einvoice/pending-invoices, GET /api/einvoice/logs, GET /api/einvoice/credentials all working.

navigation_sidebar.details: All 4 new navigation links present in sidebar: Chat, Drive, Bulk Import, E-Invoice. All links have correct data-testid attributes and are clickable.

test_classes: TestChatSystem - 4 tests (conversations, users, tasks, create task)
TestDriveSystem - 4 tests (storage, folders, files, create folder)
TestBulkImport - 4 tests (customers, items, opening_balance, opening_stock templates)
TestEInvoice - 4 tests (summary, pending invoices, logs, credentials)

mocked_apis_list: E-Invoice IRN generation is MOCKED - generates fake IRN without calling NIC API
E-Way Bill generation is MOCKED - generates fake E-Way Bill number
